name: The Doll - Horror SFX Pack
description:
I made this as a little experiment and as a way to share some love for the RPG Maker Horror genre.  Really still do love those games! 

This pack contains a total of 69 voice lines split between Japanese dialogue and English dialogue.  The Japanese doll is a lot more horror-based, while the English doll is more akin to a creepy, talking toy.  

You may use these files commercially, non-commercially, or for personal use.

You may edit these files to suit your needs for your project.

You may not re-upload or re-distribute these files.
